Emergency alerts go out in Spanish and English, but what happens if you speak another language?
items.description: The FCC has delayed implementing its multilingual emergency alerts system — making non-English speakers vulnerable during climate disasters.

items.title: With No Clear Off-Ramp, Israel’s War With Iran May Last Weeks, Not Days
items.description: Israel and Iran both have little incentive to stop and no obvious route to outright victory. Much depends on President Trump.
